ygData.subject: Re: 1H or 2H
ygData.msgSnippet: I must agree.  I am a warrior in her 25th season, and generally use my langseax of wolves for my 2H weapon (normally get hits in the 40s and once a crit of
ygData.messageBody:
I must agree. I am a warrior in her 25th season, and generally use my
langseax of wolves for my 2H weapon (normally get hits in the 40s and once a
crit of 99), but I get my 1H skills max'ed out for the better weapons I hope
to get in the future. It also seems to help my taunt when I am using dual
langseax 1H swords and taunting, that almost always gets the mob off a
caster no matter what spells he is using.

So in closing. Keep your 1H and 2H skills max'ed along with slam/bash and
kick and keep on fighting!

Patricia Bryan
Princess of the Bryan Dynasty
Dynasty Guild, Bristlebane Server
